text:
Reza Rahmani (; born 1966) is an Iranian politician. He was born in Tabriz, Iran. Rahmani was a Member of the Islamic Consultative Assembly from 2004 to 2016. In 2018, he became Minister of Industry, Mines and Business.
On 4 March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Rahmani had been infected with coronavirus disease 2019.

annotations.surface_form: Member of the Islamic Consultative Assembly
Minister of Industry, Mines and Business
